message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper proposes a data-driven framework that utilizes graphical models to learn and infer the key elements of a good scientific poster from scientific papers. The approach involves incorporating design principles and a recursive page splitting algorithm to generate the panel layout for a poster. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Computer Vision (cs.CV), Graphics (cs.GR), Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), or Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories of arXiv CS.
